channel.title: Twitter @Google AI
channel.description: Google AI is focused on bringing the benefits of AI to everyone. In conducting and applying our research, we advance the state-of-the-art in many domains. - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

item.title: In today's post, we re-evaluate the value of pre-translation for LLMs and illustrate that direct inference can be more efficient and effective for app...
item.description: In today's post, we re-evaluate the value of pre-translation for LLMs and illustrate that direct inference can be more efficient and effective for application in multilingual settings while alleviating the limitations of pre-translation. ‚Üí https://goo.gle/3VJnD2Z

item.title: Human I/O is a unified approach that uses egocentric vision, multimodal sensing, and LLM reasoning to detect situational impairments and assess a user...
item.description: Human I/O is a unified approach that uses egocentric vision, multimodal sensing, and LLM reasoning to detect situational impairments and assess a user‚Äôs ability to interact with their hands, vision, hearing or speech in a given situation. Learn more at: https://goo.gle/3KJEP1T

item.title: Code development often involves frequent copy & pasting of code that must be adjusted for the surrounding context. Here we describe Smart Paste, an in...
item.description: Code development often involves frequent copy & pasting of code that must be adjusted for the surrounding context. Here we describe Smart Paste, an internal tool that streamlines the code authoring workflow by automating adjustments to pasted code. More at https://goo.gle/4elzb3S

item.title: Machine learning models show great potential as assistive tools in healthcare. We present a framework for understanding medical imaging models, which ...
item.description: Machine learning models show great potential as assistive tools in healthcare. We present a framework for understanding medical imaging models, which leverages Gen AI & expert review to identify and interpret visual cues associated with model predictions. https://goo.gle/3V9i3oZ

item.description: Today we present new solutions to the Liner Shipping Network Design and Scheduling Problem, released as part of our new Shipping Network Design API, with the goal of maximizing the efficiency of container shipping networks at world-wide scale. Read more ‚Üí https://goo.gle/3X61X1Z

item.description: Instruction tuning can help align LLMs w/ an intended objective, but success often requires quality data tailored to specific tasks. Learn how a novel framework, CodecLM, systematically generates tailored high-quality data to align LLMs to specific tasks ‚Üíhttps://goo.gle/4c0aGah

item.title: Today we share a comprehensive evaluation of tool-assisted generation strategies, where we ask: Does few-shot tool assistance work? Surprisingly, we f...
item.description: Today we share a comprehensive evaluation of tool-assisted generation strategies, where we ask: Does few-shot tool assistance work? Surprisingly, we found that it generally does not perform better than an LM operating without tools ‚Äî learn more ‚Üíhttps://goo.gle/3yxnzKr

item.description:
At Research@ South East Asia, the exciting talks explored MedLM, Explainability using GenAI, Language inclusion with LLMs, inference techniques for LLMs, & AnthroKrishi‚Äîan AI model aimed at addressing food & water insecurity.

Thanks to everyone who made this event a success! üëè
